ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Our two main weapons...
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow what an awesome shield!  I just wanted one for the looks and was actually hoping it sucked.  Thanks for the info Sylly, I like Shada, am always on the
ygData.messageBody:
Wow what an awesome shield! I just wanted one for the looks and was
actually hoping it sucked. Thanks for the info Sylly, I like Shada, am
always on the lookout for stuff that makes me look Mahvelous. That's my
main reason for hating my Dragoon Dirk, it so stupid looking! Now that I
hear our Symphonic and Harmonic weapons look the same I'm so bummed. Our
guild now has two people over level 40 who offered to try to get me one for
all the help I gave them when they were lower level. I didn't have the
heart to tell them to look for big ugly monsters that appeared to be
carrying rusty weapons.

Kitasi


I asked "who's shield and which one" and got:

"Tuur or Xaera - Atremonious (spelling?) sheild, dropped off lord in CoM"
http://www.gameznet.com/eq/equipment/atramentousshield.html

"It's also the Sarnek Battle shield which has the same picture. Dunk has
that. Almost the same stats too."
http://www.gameznet.com/eq/equipment/sarnakbattleshield.html

Looks like we got 3 of them. Wow, that second one bards can use! Nice
stats!

Sylly

> Ask next time you see it for me please. It was in the screenshot so I
> thought it was one of your groupmates. ;-)
